name: Hannah Schneider
text: This pizza hut dosenâ€™t know how to answer their phone, to take orders. Extremely unsatisfied with this.

name: Bonnie Hunsberger
text: They have this deal, personal pan pizza w/ toppings, salad bar & drink for 6.99. Plus, you get a Senior Citizen Discount if you are of that age. Great Deal!!

name: Cindy Rothermel
text: App said 32 to 42 minutes, its been two hours. When i called they said it was delivered, then the driver realized he didnt deliver it, said 20 more minutes, still waiting.

text: We love this place. That have a lunch time buffet & the food is great. The waitress Kim is always so friendly & welcoming.

text: Friendly staff and great food! Floor and bathrooms could use some cleaning though

name: David Guinther
text: Fast service and good food. Pleasant servers.

name: Scott Kohansby
text: The place was severely understaffed.  Only one person was covering the front end and dining room.  Service was slow and the place was visibly dirty on all surfaces and dark.    I like pizza Hut,  but was disappointed with this location

name: Robert Pitten
text: We had a very good dining experience on Monday night. Although they were short staffed that evening, my compliments go out to the young female manager and the pizza chef, the only two employees working the dinner shift. They did a very commendable job for a two person show and should be complimented for doing so. Thank you.
